projects.title: E-Commerce Website Deployment
projects.description: Developed and deployed a fully functional e-commerce website with a modern, responsive design, including both frontend and backend integration.
features: Deployed on Netlify for high availability
Utilized Gatsby for fast loading and SEO optimization

projects.title: Real-Time Image Classifier App
projects.description: Built a real-time image classification app leveraging a pre-trained machine learning model, including a mobile app for Android.
features: Mobile app implementation for user-friendly interaction
Integrated pre-trained ML models for efficient classification

projects.title: IoT Application in Home Automation
projects.description: Designed a home automation system with intelligent device control and data communication using a Telegram bot and Arduino.
features: Automated device control with water flow monitoring
Wi-Fi-enabled communication to send and receive data
Integration with Telegram bot for user notifications and commands

projects.title: Data Fetching, Web Scraping and Visualisation Projects
projects.description: Implemented multiple data-fetching and web scraping projects to extract, analyze, and visualize data from APIs and websites.
features: Created Python scripts for API data fetching and visualization
Built a web scraping tool using BeautifulSoup4 for data extraction
Analyzed and visualized fetched data using Pandas and Matplotlib
